name: Apophysis Ultra Fractal Gradient File
summary: Learn about .UGR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create a UGR file, right-click in the gradient window, select Save Gradient..., choose the save location, name the file, and click Save.
To load a UGR file, select File â†’ Gradient Browser..., click Open... navigate to your file, and then apply it to the current fractal flame.
